commands.mapmakingtools.build.move.succe: The area has been moved in the %s direction by %d block(s)
commands.mapmakingtools.build.expand.suc: The area has been expanded in the %s direction %d block(s)
commands.mapmakingtools.build.shrink.suc: The area has been shrunk in the %s direction %d block(s)

mapmakingtools.filter.fillinventory.name: Fill Inventory
mapmakingtools.filter.fillinventory.comp: Set the contents of this inventory to %s.
mapmakingtools.filter.fillinventory.info: Fills all slots in the selected inventory to the given item and the stacksize. Note that you can left beyond 0 to take the stacksize to unlimited. This sets the stacksize to -1, therefore in inventories such as dispensers and hoppers this will make them never run out.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobArmor.name: Mob Armour
mapmakingtools.filter.mobArmor.removeInd: Removed a minecart from the list
mapmakingtools.filter.mobArmor.addIndex: Added a minecart to the list
mapmakingtools.filter.mobArmor.info: This filter is only available on Zombie, PigZombie and Skeleton. It sets the armour and held item the mob will spawn with.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobposition.name: Mob Position
mapmakingtools.filter.mobposition.notint: That is not a valid number.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobposition.comple: Set the entity to spawn at the given position.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobposition.info: Allows you to choose an exact spot you want the entity to spawn, instead of randomly round the spawner. This can be relative to the spawner or an exact coordinate.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobvelocity.name: Mob Velocity
mapmakingtools.filter.mobvelocity.notint: That is not a valid number.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobvelocity.comple: Set the entity to spawn with the given motion.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobvelocity.info: Allows you to choose the velocity the entity spawns with. Normally in the range of -2.0 to 2.0
mapmakingtools.filter.babymonster.name: Baby Creature
mapmakingtools.filter.babymonster.info: Turns the mob into a baby version.
mapmakingtools.filter.babymonster.comple: Set the mob to a different age.
You can edit the fuse and explosion radius of the creeper that will be spawned. The fuse is in ticks (20/s) and the explosion radius is in blocks.
That is not a valid number.
Set the fuse and explosion radius of the creeper to the given values.
mapmakingtools.filter.mobType.name: Mob Type
mapmakingtools.filter.mobType.info: Changes the current selected 'minecart index' entity type to a given entity type.
mapmakingtools.filter.spawnertimings.com: Changed the spawner settings for all indexs of the spawner
mapmakingtools.filter.spawnertimings.inf: Allows you to change the base properties for a mob spawner, be careful when messing with this stuff :D.
mapmakingtools.filter.spawnertimings.not: That is not a valid number.
mapmakingtools.filter.spawnertimings.com: Set the spawner timings for all entries.
mapmakingtools.filter.chestsymmetrify.in: Moves the items in the chest so that the pattern is symmetrical, it will then put the same amount of blocks and items on each side and balance things up.
mapmakingtools.filter.chestsymmetrify.no: There is nothing in the chest.
mapmakingtools.filter.chestsymmetrify.co: Made the chests items look at symmtrical as possible.
mapmakingtools.filter.changeitem.name: Item Selection
mapmakingtools.filter.changeitem.info: Allows you to set the item that the 'entityitem' will be. This includes metadata, nbt data, etc.
mapmakingtools.filter.changeitem.complet: Set the spawner to the item %s.
Allows you to add colour and edit the command block alias (The bit before the actual text)
mapmakingtools.filter.customgive.name: Custom Give
mapmakingtools.filter.customgive.info: Allows you to create your item and then convert it to a /give command with meta and nbt derived from the item in text form.
mapmakingtools.filter.villagershop.name: Villager Shop
mapmakingtools.filter.villagershop.info: Allows you to edit the villagers contents and which items it sells for what and how many times that trade can be carried out.
mapmakingtools.filter.villagerprofession: Allows you to change the profession of the villager this affects the base trades and texture.
Set the villager to the profession id '%d'
mapmakingtools.filter.converttodropper.i: Converts the dispenser to a dropper.
mapmakingtools.filter.converttodispenser: Converts the dropper to a dispenser.
mapmakingtools.filter.signedit.name: Sign Edit
mapmakingtools.filter.signedit.info: Edit signs that have been previously placed, just replaces text and resets all actions the sign does.
mapmakingtools.itemattribute.lore.name: Lore
mapmakingtools.itemattribute.book.name: Written Book
mapmakingtools.itemattribute.potion.name: Potions
mapmakingtools.chat.updatemessage: A new %s version exists %s. Get it here: %s
